name: AdLocal
overview:
AdLocal allows brands and agencies to run location mobile advertising and sponsorships. The platform allows consumers with mobile devices to receive ads by taking into account their physical location via GPS, Cell-IDs, and other mobile data. The platform also allows a self-service model where local merchants can sign up and run mobile ad campaigns. AdLocalâ€™s mobile advertising solutions allow brands and local advertisers to deliver their marketing communication more efficiently by pin-pointing a selected geographic region or market area (e.g. target neighborhood of retail store).

AdLocal raised a total of 3 rounds of funding from Soft Bank, Jafco Ventures, and Edge Capital.

AdLocal has been successfully operating its ad network globally for years, serving more than seven billion ads for premium brands like Subway, Denny’s, Nissan, Nike and providing targeting/analytics tools for ad agencies to reach audience by location, distance, time of day, demographics & more.
